Uses of Interface
view.MyJBombermanFormat

Packages that use MyJBombermanFormat
Package
Description
controller
 
view
 

  • Uses of MyJBombermanFormat in controller

    Classes in controller that implement MyJBombermanFormat
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DynaManager
    The DynaManager has the main role of holding the objects that represent the levels, managing their loading and selection necessary for their effective use.
    final class 
    FactoryDecoratedLevel
    This factory contains all the information, references and methods needed to create any level in this game.
    class 
    FactoryDecoratedNPC
    This factory contains all the information and methods needed to create non playable character set for any level of the game.
    class 
    FactoryDecoratedPlayerCharacter
    This factory contains all the information and methods needed to create any playable character of this game.
    class 
    StatePlaying
    This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from StateStarter to this at the end of StateStarter's count down; (2) from this to StatePaused if this' actualTG.isPaused = true; (3) from this to StateContinue if this' gameContinue = true; (4) from this to StateGameOver if this' gameOver = true; (5) from this to StateWinLevel if this' gameWin = true and there's another next level; (6) from this to StateWinStage if this' gameWin = true and there's not another next level.
    class 
    ThreadDelta
    Basic functionalities that a concrete ThreadGame must have.
    class 
    ThreadGame
    This class models the algorithms which create a game session.
    class 
    ThreadMenu
    The JBomberMan's Main method always start an instance of this class which will be the same in all life-cycle of the application.

    Classes in view that implement MyJBombermanFormat
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Arches
    This class is composed by methods and pictures that concur to represent the external non-playable borders for game-panel.
    class 
    ArchesCity
    The Arches with render specific format for City Stage context.
    class 
    ArchesClassical
    The Arches with render specific format for Classical Stage context.
    class 
    ArchesJungle
    The Arches with render specific format for Jungle Stage context.
    class 
    DecoratedEnemyBoss
    Decorated version of an EnemyBoss
    class 
    DecoratedGravediggerByNpc
    Decorated Gravedigger related to a death NPC event.
    class 
    DynaFrame
    This is the personalized JFrame of the application in which the View manifests.
    class 
    DynaMasterCard
    This Class is the Game Model' Observer during running ThreadMenu and it is the Master of its CardLayout: the Layout that manages JPanels of the application.
    class 
    DynaSlaveGame
    This Class is the Game Model' Observer during running ThreadGame.
    class 
    DynaSlaveStart
    This Card is the first shown by this Application.
    class 
    EnjoyNpcMediator
    Implemented version of NpcMediator from Model in which view components are developed.
    class 
    EnjoyPowerUpMediator
    Implemented version of PowerUpMediator from Model in which view components are developed.
